turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need to buy a coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure would you like to order from Starbucks or Peet's Coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It should be the one in Cuz I know there's one in Carson City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I see three options, one on Williams street, another on Carson Street and another one on Carson street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, it's it's the second one on Carson.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Venti iced shortbread cinnamon latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, and what type of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, and would you like whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OKay, so i got a Venti, Iced Cinnamon Shortbread Latte, with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Give me a moment to send that over for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.
